start_date.name: start_date
start_date.description: Select the start date of the simulation

end_date.name: end_date
end_date.description: Select the end date of the simulation

event.name: Daily
event.description: End of daily simulation time step

maxtmodifier.description: Change in maximum temperature in degrees celsius

mintmodifier.description: Change in minimum temperature in degrees celsius

rule.name: Sow using a variable rule
rule.condition: if (paddock_is_fallow() = 1 and FallowIn <> 'yes' and (NextCrop = 0 or NextCrop = '[crop]')) then if (date_within('[date1], [date2]') = 1) then if (rain[[rainnumdays]] >= [raincrit] AND esw >= [esw_amount]) OR ('[must_sow]' = 'yes' AND today = date('[date2]'))) THEN ChooseNextCrop = 'yes' ! for rotations [crop] sow plants =[density], sowing_depth = [depth], cultivar = [cultivar], row_spacing = [row_spacing] endif if today = date('[date2]') then ChooseNextCrop = 'yes' endif endif endif

property.name: esw_amount
property.description: Enter minimum allowable available soil water (mm) :

property.name: crop
property.description: Enter name of crop to sow :

rule.name: Sorghum sowing rule
rule.condition: if (paddock_is_fallow() = 1 and FallowIn <> 'yes' and (NextCrop = 0 or NextCrop = '[crop]')) then if (date_within('[date1], [date2]') = 1) then if (rain[[rainnumdays]] >= [raincrit] AND esw >= [esw_amount]) OR ('[must_sow]' = 'yes' AND today = date('[date2]'))) THEN ChooseNextCrop = 'yes' ! for rotations [crop] sow plants =[density], sowing_depth = [depth], cultivar = [cultivar], row_spacing = [row_spacing], tiller_no_fertile = [ftn] (), skip = [skiprow] endif if today = date('[date2]') then ChooseNextCrop = 'yes' endif endif endif

property.name: esw_amount
property.description: Enter minimum allowable available soil water (mm) :

property.name: crop
property.description: Enter name of crop to sow :

rule.name: Sow on a fixed date
rule.condition: if (today = date('[date]') then [crop] sow plants =[density], sowing_depth = [depth], cultivar = [cultivar], row_spacing = [row_spacing] endif

property.name: crop
property.description: Enter name of crop to sow :

rule.name: SUGAR management
rule.condition:
! ----------------------------------------------------------------- ! Book keeping to round days to integer values plantlen = nearest_int(plantlen) ratoonlen = nearest_int(ratoonlen)
! Initialise and set a time counter for entire run dah = 0
if (sugar.crop_status = 'alive') then dah = 0
! Set harvest dates for each crop phase if (sugar.das = [plantlen] and ratoon_no = 0) or (sugar.das = [ratoonlen] and ratoon_no > 0) then
sugar harvest
if (ratoon_no = [NoRatoons] + 1) then ! plough the crop out sugar kill_crop sugar end_crop
else ! Set stalk density sugar.plants = [ratoon_stalks] endif else ! We have not reached the harvest date for this ratoon. endif
elseif (sugar.crop_status = 'dead') then sugar harvest sugar end_crop
elseif (sugar.crop_status = 'out') and (today = date('[planting_day]') then sugar sow plants = 10 (), cultivar = [variety], sowing_depth = [sowing_depth] sugar.plants = [plant_stalks] dah = 0
else dah = dah + 1 endif

property.name: crop
property.description: Enter name of crop to sow :

property.name: plantlen
property.description: Duration of a plant crop (days) (30 days/month * 15 months) :

property.name: ratoonlen
property.description: Duration of a ratoon crop (days) (30 days/month * 13 months) :

rule.name: Lucerne Ley fixed sow harvest at flowering

property.name: crop
property.description: Enter name of crop to sow :

property.name: harvest_ht
property.description: Enter the height to harvest the crop :

property.name: remove
property.description: Fraction of maerial removed leaving the system (balance to residue):

property.name: killdate
property.description: date lucerne is to be removed :

rule.condition: if (today = date('[date]') then [crop] sow plants =[density], sowing_depth = [depth], cultivar = [cultivar], row_spacing = [row_spacing] [crop]LeyYears = [leyyears] endif

if [crop].stage_name = 'flowering' then [crop] harvest height = [harvest_ht] endif if today= date('[killdate]') and [crop].plant_status <>'out' then if ( [crop]LeyYears > 0 ) then [crop]LeyYears = [crop]LeyYears - 1 else [crop] end_crop endif endif

rule.name: Lucerne Ley variable sow harvest at flowering

property.name: esw_amount
property.description: Enter minimum allowable available soil water (mm) :

property.name: crop
property.description: Enter name of crop to sow :

property.name: harvest_ht
property.description: Enter the height to harvest the crop :

property.name: remove
property.description: Fraction of maerial removed leaving the system (balance to residue):

property.name: killdate
property.description: date lucerne is to be removed :

rule.condition: if (paddock_is_fallow() = 1 and FallowIn <> 'yes' and (NextCrop = 0 or NextCrop = '[crop]')) then if (date_within('[date1], [date2]') = 1) then if (rain[[rainnumdays]] >= [raincrit] AND esw >= [esw_amount]) OR ('[must_sow]' = 'yes' AND today = date('[date2]'))) THEN ChooseNextCrop = 'yes' ! for rotations [crop] sow plants =[density], sowing_depth = [depth], cultivar = [cultivar], row_spacing = [row_spacing] [crop]LeyYears = [leyyears]! for the length of the lucerne ley endif if today = date('[date2]') then ChooseNextCrop = 'yes' endif endif endif

if [crop].stage_name = 'flowering' then [crop] harvest height = [harvest_ht] endif if today= date('[killdate]') and [crop].plant_status <>'out' then if ( [crop]LeyYears > 0 ) then [crop]LeyYears = [crop]LeyYears - 1 else [crop] end_crop endif endif

rule.name: Harvesting rule
rule.condition: if [crop].stage_name = 'harvest_ripe' or [crop].plant_status = 'dead' then [crop] harvest [crop] end_crop endif

property.name: crop
property.description: Enter name of crop to harvest when ripe :

rule.name: Fertilise at sowing
rule.condition: [fertmodule] apply amount = [fert_amount_sow] (kg/ha), depth = 50 (mm), type = [fert_type_sow]

property.name: modulename
property.description: On which module should the event come from :

property.name: eventname
property.description: On which event should fertiliser be applied :

property.name: fertmodule
property.description: Module used to apply the fertiliser :

property.name: fert_amount_sow
property.description: Amount of starter fertiliser at sowing (kg/ha) :

property.name: fert_type_sow
property.listvalues: NO3_N, NH4_N, NH4NO3, urea_N, urea_no3, urea

rule.name: Fertilise on fixed date
rule.condition: if (today = date('[fert_date]') then N_topsoil = no3(1) + nh4(1) + no3(2) + nh4(2) if (N_topsoil < [fert_criteria]) then [fertmodule] apply amount = [fert_amount] (kg/ha), depth = 50 (mm), type = [fert_type] () endif endif

property.name: fert_criteria
property.description: Don't add fertiliser if N in top 2 layers exceeds (kg/ha) :

property.name: fertmodule
property.description: Module used to apply the fertiliser :

property.name: fert_type
property.listvalues: NO3_N, NH4_N, NH4NO3, urea_N, urea_no3, urea

rule.name: Fertilise on fixed date - top up
rule.condition: if (today = date('[fert_date]') then N_deficit = [fert_criteria] - (no3(1) + nh4(1) + no3(2) + nh4(2) + no3(3) + nh4(3)) '[fertmodule]' apply amount = N_deficit (kg/ha), depth = 50 (mm), type = [fert_type] () endif

property.name: fert_criteria
property.description: Amount of N required in top 3 layers (kg/ha) :

property.name: fertmodule
property.description: Module used to apply the fertiliser :

property.name: fert_type
property.listvalues: NO3_N, NH4_N, NH4NO3, urea_N, urea_no3, urea

rule.name: Irrigate at sowing
rule.condition: if ([irrig_amount_evt] > 0) then '[irrigatemodule]' apply amount = [irrig_amount_evt] (mm) endif

property.name: modulename
property.description: The module the event come from :

property.name: eventname
property.description: Which event should irrigation be applied :

property.name: irrigatemodule
property.description: Module used to apply the irrigation :

rule.name: Tillage on fixed date
rule.condition: if (today = date('[tillage_date]') then if ('[tillage_type]' = 'user_defined') then '[surfaceommodule]' tillage type = [tillage_type], f_incorp = [tillage_f_incorp] (), tillage_depth = [tillage_depth] else '[surfaceommodule]' tillage type = [tillage_type] endif ready_to_till_pre_sow = 0 till_day_pre_sow = 0 endif

property.name: surfaceommodule
property.description: Module used to apply the tillage :

property.name: tillage_type
property.listvalues: user_defined, chisel, disc, planter, burn, burn_90, graze, scarifier, rip, blade, tine

property.name: tillage_f_incorp
property.description: User_defined fraction of surface residues to incorporate (0-1):

rule.name: Reset water, nitrogen and surfaceOM on fixed date
rule.condition: if (today = date('[reset_date]') then resetWater = '[resetWater]' resetNitrogen = '[resetNitrogen]' resetSurfaceOM = '[resetSurfaceOM]' if (resetWater = 'yes') then '[soilmodule] Water' reset endif if (resetNitrogen = 'yes') then '[soilmodule] Nitrogen' reset endif if (resetSurfaceOM = 'yes') then '[surfaceommodule]' reset endif endif

category.name: When should a reset be done

property.name: surfaceommodule
property.description: Name of your surface organic matter module :

rule.name: Reset water, nitrogen and surfaceOM on sowing
rule.condition: resetWater = '[resetWater]' resetNitrogen = '[resetNitrogen]' resetSurfaceOM = '[resetSurfaceOM]' if (resetWater = 'yes') then '[soilmodule] Water' reset endif if (resetNitrogen = 'yes') then '[soilmodule] Nitrogen' reset endif if (resetSurfaceOM = 'yes') then '[surfaceommodule]' reset endif

category.name: When should a reset be done

property.name: modulename
property.description: The module the event is to come from :

property.name: eventname
property.description: On which event should a reset be done :

property.name: surfaceommodule
property.description: Name of your surface organic matter module :

rule.name: Rotations
rule.condition: NextCropIndex = 1 NextCrop = ' ' ChooseNextCrop = 'yes' SummerFallowIn = 'no' WinterFallowIn = 'no' FallowIn = 'no'

if (ChooseNextCrop = 'yes') then if (NextCropIndex = 1) then NextCrop = '[crop1]' elseif (NextCropIndex = 2) then NextCrop = '[crop2]' elseif (NextCropIndex = 3) then NextCrop = '[crop3]' elseif (NextCropIndex = 4) then NextCrop = '[crop4]' elseif (NextCropIndex = 5) then NextCrop = '[crop5]' elseif (NextCropIndex = 6) then NextCrop = '[crop6]' elseif (NextCropIndex = 7) then NextCrop = '[crop7]' elseif (NextCropIndex = 8) then NextCrop = '[crop8]' elseif (NextCropIndex = 9) then NextCrop = '[crop9]' elseif (NextCropIndex = 10) then NextCrop = '[crop10]' elseif (NextCropIndex = 11) then NextCrop = '[crop11]' elseif (NextCropIndex = 12) then NextCrop = '[crop12]' elseif (NextCropIndex = 13) then NextCrop = '[crop13]' elseif (NextCropIndex = 14) then NextCrop = '[crop14]' elseif (NextCropIndex = 15) then NextCrop = '[crop15]' elseif (NextCropIndex = 16) then NextCrop = '[crop16]' elseif (NextCropIndex = 17) then NextCrop = '[crop17]' elseif (NextCropIndex = 18) then NextCrop = '[crop18]' elseif (NextCropIndex = 19) then NextCrop = '[crop19]' elseif (NextCropIndex = 20) then NextCrop = '[crop20]' endif if (NextCrop = 'nil' or NextCrop = ' ') then NextCrop = '[crop1]' NextCropIndex = 1 endif NextCropIndex = NextCropIndex + 1 ChooseNextCrop = 'no' endif ! if the next crop is due to be a fallow and we're within the ! correct date range then put a fallow in. if (NextCrop = '[WinterFallowName]') then if (paddock_is_fallow() = 1 and FallowIn = 'no') then if (date_within('[SummerFallowEndDate], [WinterFallowEndDate]') then WinterFallowIn = 'yes' FallowIn = 'yes' ChooseNextCrop = 'yes' endif endif elseif (NextCrop = '[SummerFallowName]') then if (paddock_is_fallow() = 1 and FallowIn = 'no') then if (date_within('[WinterFallowEndDate], [SummerFallowEndDate]') then SummerFallowIn = 'yes' FallowIn = 'yes' ChooseNextCrop = 'yes' endif endif endif
! if we currently have a fallow in and we're at the end of the fallow window ! then remove the fallow. if (WinterFallowIn = 'yes' and today = date('[WinterFallowEndDate]')+1) then WinterFallowIn = 'no' FallowIn = 'no' endif if (SummerFallowIn = 'yes' and today = date('[SummerFallowEndDate]')+1) then SummerFallowIn = 'no' FallowIn = 'no' endif

rule.name: Buy cattle on a fixed date
rule.condition: cattle_presence = 'off'

if (today = date('[buy_date]') then [stockmodule] buystock number = [buy_number] (-), genotype = '[genotype]', sex = [sex], age = [buy_age] (months), weight = [buy_weight] (kg) cattle_presence = 'on' endif

property.name: genotype
property.listvalues: Angus,ayrshire,beef shorthorn,brahman,brahman x british,brown swiss,charolais,charolais x british,charolais x friesian,charolais x holstein,chianina,dairy shorthorn,fresian,fresian x british,guernsey,hereford,holstein,holstein x british,jersey,limousein,sahiwal,simmental,south devon

rule.name: Buy cattle on feed-on-offer
rule.condition: cattle_presence = 'off'

if ([herbage_module].biomass >= [buy_feed_on_offer] AND cattle_presence = 'off') then [stockmodule] buystock number = [buy_number] (-), genotype = '[genotype]', sex = [sex], age = [buy_age] (months), weight = [buy_weight] (kg) cattle_presence = 'on' endif

property.name: genotype
property.listvalues: Angus,ayrshire,beef shorthorn,brahman,brahman x british,brown swiss,charolais,charolais x british,charolais x friesian,charolais x holstein,chianina,dairy shorthorn,fresian,fresian x british,guernsey,hereford,holstein,holstein x british,jersey,limousein,sahiwal,simmental,south devon

rule.name: Sell cattle on a fixed date
rule.condition: if (today = date('[sell_date]') AND cattle_presence = 'on') then [stockmodule] sellstock number = [sell_number] (-) cattle_presence = 'off' endif

rule.name: Sell cattle on weight
rule.condition: if ((stock.weight >= [sell_on_weight_gain] OR stock.weight <= [sell_on_weight_loss]) AND cattle_presence = 'on') then [stockmodule] sellstock number = [sell_number] (-) cattle_presence = 'off' endif

rule.name: Buy sheep on a fixed date
rule.condition: sheep_presence = 'off'

if (today = date('[buy_date]') then [stockmodule] buystock number = [buy_number] (-), genotype = '[genotype]', sex = [sex], age = [buy_age] (months), weight = [buy_weight] (kg) sheep_presence = 'on' endif

property.name: genotype
property.listvalues: black face x white face,birder keucester, border leicester x merino,columbia,corriedale,delaine-merino,dorset x merino,dorset,finnsheep,hampshire,large merino,medium merino,small merino,polwarth,polypay,romney,ryeland,southdown,suffolk,targhee,texel,US corriedale,US romney,US southdown,US suffolk

rule.condition: if (today = date('[sell_date]') AND sheep_presence = 'on') then [stockmodule] sellstock number = [sell_number] (-) sheep_presence = 'off' endif

rule.name: Sell sheep on weight
rule.condition: if ((stock.weight >= [sell_on_weight_gain] OR stock.weight <= [sell_on_weight_loss]) AND sheep_presence = 'on') then [stockmodule] sellstock number = [sell_number] (-) sheep_presence = 'off' endif

rule.name: Feed supplement in a fixed date window
rule.condition: if (date_within('[feed_start_date], [feed_end_date]') = 1) then [supplementmodule] feedsupplement supplement = [feed_name] (-), amount = [feed_amount] (kg) endif

property.name: feed_name
property.listvalues: 'barley- crushed','barley- whole','barley straw','beans- field','bran','brewers grains','canola meal','canola straw','citrus pulp- dry','coconut meal','cottonseed- whole','cottonseed meal','fish meal','groundnut meal','hay','lucerne pellets','lupins','linseed meal','maize','maize bran','maize gluten fd','maize straw','molasses','oats- crushed','oats- whole','oat bran','oat chaff','oat straw','peas','pea pod meal','pea straw','pellets','rice- crushed','rice- whole','rice bran','rice straw','rye','safflower meal','silage','sorghum','sorghum- whole','soya bean meal','sunflower meal','tallow','triticale- crushed','triticale- whole','urea','vetch grain','wheat- crushed','wheat- whole','wheat chaff','wheat pollard','wheat straw'
property.description: Name of the supplement to purchase :

property.name: feed_amount
property.description: Fresh weight of supplement to purchase (kg) :

rule.name: Feed supplement on animal condition
rule.condition: FALSE = 0 TRUE = 1 feeding = FALSE feed_rate = 0.0 ! Rate of feeding in kg FW/day feed_rate_factor = 0.2 est_lag_days = 10.0 / feed_rate_factor initial_feed_rate = 0.0

dlt_cond_score = cond_score_all - yest_cond_score_all yest_cond_score_all = cond_score_all if (feeding = TRUE AND cond_score_all = 0.0) then feeding = FALSE endif
if ((feeding = FALSE) AND (cond_score_all < [crit_cs]) AND (dlt_cond_score < 0.0)) then feeding = TRUE feed_rate = initial_feed_rate else ! leave feeding as is endif
if (feeding = TRUE) then feed_rate = feed_rate - feed_rate_factor * (cond_score_all + dlt_cond_score*est_lag_days - [crit_cs]) if (feed_rate > [max_feed_rate]) then feed_rate = [max_feed_rate] elseif (feed_rate < 0.0) then feed_rate = 0.0 endif if (feed_rate > 0) then feed_amount = feed_rate * number_all [supplementmodule] feedsupplement supplement = [feed_name], amount = feed_amount else feed_rate = 0.0 endif else feed_rate = 0.0 endif

property.name: crit_cs
property.description: Critical condition score. 1.0 is sensible for dry stock :

property.name: max_feed_rate
property.description: Maximum rate of feeding in kg FW/day; 1.0 is sensible for sheep :

property.name: feed_name
property.listvalues: 'barley- crushed','barley- whole','barley straw','beans- field','bran','brewers grains','canola meal','canola straw','citrus pulp- dry','coconut meal','cottonseed- whole','cottonseed meal','fish meal','groundnut meal','hay','lucerne pellets','lupins','linseed meal','maize','maize bran','maize gluten fd','maize straw','molasses','oats- crushed','oats- whole','oat bran','oat chaff','oat straw','peas','pea pod meal','pea straw','pellets','rice- crushed','rice- whole','rice bran','rice straw','rye','safflower meal','silage','sorghum','sorghum- whole','soya bean meal','sunflower meal','tallow','triticale- crushed','triticale- whole','urea','vetch grain','wheat- crushed','wheat- whole','wheat chaff','wheat pollard','wheat straw'
property.description: Name of the supplement to purchase :

rule.name: Feed supplement on animal condition loss
rule.condition: FALSE = 0 TRUE = 1 feeding = FALSE feed_rate = 0.0 ! Rate of feeding in kg FW/day crit_cs = 0.0 feed_rate_factor = 0.2 est_lag_days = 10.0 / feed_rate_factor initial_feed_rate = 0.0

dlt_cond_score = cond_score_all - yest_cond_score_all yest_cond_score_all = cond_score_all if (feeding = TRUE AND cond_score_all = 0.0) then crit_cs = 0.0 feeding = FALSE endif
if (dlt_cond_score[[days]] < [crit_condition_change] AND crit_cs <= 0.0) then crit_cs = cond_score_all endif if ((feeding = FALSE) AND (cond_score_all < crit_cs)) then feeding = TRUE feed_rate = initial_feed_rate else ! leave feeding as is endif
if (feeding = TRUE) then feed_rate = feed_rate - feed_rate_factor * (cond_score_all + dlt_cond_score*est_lag_days - crit_cs) if (feed_rate > [max_feed_rate]) then feed_rate = [max_feed_rate] elseif (feed_rate < 0.0) then feed_rate = 0.0 endif if (feed_rate > 0) then feed_amount = feed_rate * number_all [supplementmodule] feedsupplement supplement = [feed_name], amount = feed_amount else feed_rate = 0.0 endif else feed_rate = 0.0 endif

property.name: days
property.description: Number of days to sum condition change :

property.name: crit_condition_change
property.description: Critical condition change needed to start feeding (kg/head) :

property.name: max_feed_rate
property.description: Maximum rate of feeding in kg FW/day; 1.0 is sensible for sheep :

property.name: feed_name
property.listvalues: 'barley- crushed','barley- whole','barley straw','beans- field','bran','brewers grains','canola meal','canola straw','citrus pulp- dry','coconut meal','cottonseed- whole','cottonseed meal','fish meal','groundnut meal','hay','lucerne pellets','lupins','linseed meal','maize','maize bran','maize gluten fd','maize straw','molasses','oats- crushed','oats- whole','oat bran','oat chaff','oat straw','peas','pea pod meal','pea straw','pellets','rice- crushed','rice- whole','rice bran','rice straw','rye','safflower meal','silage','sorghum','sorghum- whole','soya bean meal','sunflower meal','tallow','triticale- crushed','triticale- whole','urea','vetch grain','wheat- crushed','wheat- whole','wheat chaff','wheat pollard','wheat straw'
property.description: Name of the supplement to purchase :

rule.name: Feed supplement on animal weight loss
rule.condition: FALSE = 0 TRUE = 1 feeding = FALSE feed_rate = 0.0 ! Rate of feeding in kg FW/day crit_wt = 0.0 feed_rate_factor = 0.5 est_lag_days = 10.0 / feed_rate_factor initial_feed_rate = 0.1

if (feeding = TRUE AND cond_score_all = 0.0) then crit_wt = 0.0 feeding = FALSE endif
if (wt_change_all[[days]] < [crit_wt_change] AND crit_wt <= 0.0) then crit_wt = weight_all endif if ((feeding = FALSE) AND (weight_all < crit_wt)) then feeding = TRUE feed_rate = initial_feed_rate else ! leave feeding as is endif
if (feeding = TRUE) then feed_rate = feed_rate - feed_rate_factor * (weight_all + wt_change_all*est_lag_days - crit_wt) if (feed_rate > [max_feed_rate]) then feed_rate = [max_feed_rate] elseif (feed_rate < 0.0) then feed_rate = 0.0 endif if (feed_rate > 0) then feed_amount = feed_rate * number_all [supplementmodule] feedsupplement supplement = [feed_name], amount = feed_amount else feed_rate = 0.0 endif else feed_rate = 0.0 endif

property.name: days
property.description: Number of days to sum weight change :

property.name: crit_weight_change
property.description: Critical weight change needed to start feeding (kg/head) :

property.name: max_feed_rate
property.description: Maximum rate of feeding in kg FW/day; 1.0 is sensible for sheep :

property.name: feed_name
property.listvalues: 'barley- crushed','barley- whole','barley straw','beans- field','bran','brewers grains','canola meal','canola straw','citrus pulp- dry','coconut meal','cottonseed- whole','cottonseed meal','fish meal','groundnut meal','hay','lucerne pellets','lupins','linseed meal','maize','maize bran','maize gluten fd','maize straw','molasses','oats- crushed','oats- whole','oat bran','oat chaff','oat straw','peas','pea pod meal','pea straw','pellets','rice- crushed','rice- whole','rice bran','rice straw','rye','safflower meal','silage','sorghum','sorghum- whole','soya bean meal','sunflower meal','tallow','triticale- crushed','triticale- whole','urea','vetch grain','wheat- crushed','wheat- whole','wheat chaff','wheat pollard','wheat straw'
property.description: Name of the supplement to purchase :

rule.name: Feed supplement to reach a target weight
rule.condition: feed_rate = 0.0 ! Rate of feeding in kg FW/day

if (date_within('[date_start_feed], [date_end_feed]') = 1) then days_left = date('[date_end_feed]') - date('[date_start_feed]') if (days_left < 0.0) then days_left = days_left + 365.0 endif if (days_left > 0) then dwt_reqd = ([target_wt] - stock.weight_all) / days_left
feed_rate = feed_rate + (2.0 * (dwt_reqd - wt_change_all)) if (feed_rate > [max_feed_rate]) then feed_rate = [max_feed_rate] elseif (feed_rate < 0.0) then feed_rate = 0.0 endif
if (feed_rate > 0) then if (today = date('[date_start_feed]') then feed_rate = feed_rate * 0.5 endif feed_amount = feed_rate * number_all [supplementmodule] feedsupplement supplement = [feed_name], amount = feed_amount else feed_rate = 0.0 endif endif endif

property.name: target_wt
property.description: Target weight per head to finish (kg) :

property.name: max_feed_rate
property.description: Maximum rate of feeding in kg FW/day; 1.0 is sensible for sheep :

property.name: feed_name
property.listvalues: 'barley- crushed','barley- whole','barley straw','beans- field','bran','brewers grains','canola meal','canola straw','citrus pulp- dry','coconut meal','cottonseed- whole','cottonseed meal','fish meal','groundnut meal','hay','lucerne pellets','lupins','linseed meal','maize','maize bran','maize gluten fd','maize straw','molasses','oats- crushed','oats- whole','oat bran','oat chaff','oat straw','peas','pea pod meal','pea straw','pellets','rice- crushed','rice- whole','rice bran','rice straw','rye','safflower meal','silage','sorghum','sorghum- whole','soya bean meal','sunflower meal','tallow','triticale- crushed','triticale- whole','urea','vetch grain','wheat- crushed','wheat- whole','wheat chaff','wheat pollard','wheat straw'
property.description: Name of the supplement to purchase :

rule.name: Debugger

property.name: asw_depth
property.description: Depth to which ASW is calculated. (mm)

property.name: crit_fr_asw
property.description: Fraction of ASW below which irrigation is applied (0-1.0)
